main event: A pilot and radar observer at Misawa Air Base, Japan, observed an unidentified object with varied colors and a ball shape that disintegrated.
interesting points: The object was reported traveling from West to East and was seen at an altitude of 7000 feet while the aircraft was flying at 250 knots., The flashing lights observed by the pilot appeared to form a triangular shape., Both visual and radar observations confirmed the sighting., Various military personnel were involved in the observation., The conclusions suggested possibilities of balloons or astronomical phenomena, but with insufficient data for definitive evaluation.
sighted object: an unidentified object with varied colors and ball shape
witness description: Pilot and radar observer from the military.
